Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>In better times, I'd have complimented
your decision to come out to Lurelin on
such a fine morning.
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I thought, with the monsters gone,
I'd finally get back on the water and
start fishing again.
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>I don't have any fish right now.


But when I catch some, I'll put them
right here. You can help yourself!
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>In better times, I'd have thanked you for
venturing out to our quaint fishing town.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>...Then again, before I get out there and
start fishing again...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I should really rebuild my house.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm. I'd like to try my luck opening a
treasure chest.<sp:0:4:0>But I already did it once today, so I'll
have to get one of <clr:0000>those<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400>Aaah!<sp:5:1:0> Focus, Armes, focus! You don't
have time to muck around with treasure
chests today!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>You've gotta rebuild your house first.
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>My house looks as good as the day
I moved in! Now I can fish in peace
knowing I have a home to return to.
I don't have any fish for you, but when
I do, I'll put them here. You're welcome
to take as many as you like.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>However, I need to do something about
my house first.

I'm not sure how to fix it after so
much damage. Even the central pillar
is destroyed...
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh! Sorry to talk your ear off out in the
middle of a rainstorm.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>If I had a roof, I'd invite you to join me
under it. <sp:5:0:0>But, alas...
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>Before you rebuilt my house, I spent
every night out in the cold and rain,
cowering at crashes of thunder.
But now I've got a roof to sleep under.
I never knew I'd be grateful for something
so simple as that.
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But the village is still overrun with
monsters. Just about everyone has
gotten out already.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>As our town's savior, you deserve a
feast's worth of fish. I'd like to go out
and catch some for you.
But I won't be able to concentrate,
knowing my house is a pile of rubble.

What can I do? I don't have the slightest
idea how to rebuild a house...
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>There used to be a place here called the
<clr:0000>Lucky Treasure Shop<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>

It drew a lot of tourists to our little
coastal town, that place.

Always had <clr:0000>great prizes<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But we'll be hard-pressed to rebuild it
after the ransacking it got. It's looking
as run-down as my house...
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you need a bed, Chessica at the inn
says she's ready for guests.

You saved our village. The least you
deserve is a good night's sleep.
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The inn, the restaurant, and the
Lucky Treasure Shop are all closed,<sp:5:0:0>
maybe forever...
Basically, if a serene vacation is what
you're after, go somewhere else.<sp:0:4:0>My friend is the only reason I'm still here.
He sprinted off to get a change of clothes
and hasn't come back.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Why he did that, I don't know. I told him
it wouldn't end well...
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now I've seen it all!<sp:0:4:0>You rebuilt the <clr:0000>Lucky Treasure Shop<clr:ffff>
like it was nothing!<sp:0:4:0>Thank you so much for helping us fix up
our little village.<sp:0:4:0>Uh...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>C-<sp:5:0:0>could you maybe do that for my
house too?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>My house looks as good as the day
I moved in! Now I can fish in peace
knowing I have a home to return to.
Whatever fish I catch, I'll put here.
You're welcome to take as many as
you like.
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The village is crawling with monsters,
so the inn, the restaurant, and the
Lucky Treasure Shop are all closed.
Basically, if you want a serene vacation,
go somewhere else.

My friend is the only reason I'm still here.
He sprinted off to get a change of clothes
and hasn't come back.
I'm scared for him, but I'm too scared
for ME to get any closer.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Lucky Treasure Shop <clr:ffff>used to be
our village's biggest attraction.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>prizes<clr:ffff> were great. Out-of-towners
and locals alike would line up to try to
win them.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But we'll be hard-pressed to rebuild it
after the ransacking it got. It's looking
as run-down as my house...
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>Before you rebuilt my house, I spent
every night out in the cold and rain,
cowering at crashes of thunder.
But now I've got a roof over my head.
I never knew I'd be grateful for something
so simple as that.
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>There used to be an attraction here called
the <clr:0000>Lucky Treasure Shop<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>It drew a lot of tourists to our little
coastal town, that place.

Always had <clr:0000>great prizes<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But we'll be hard-pressed to rebuild it
after the ransacking it got.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Have you dropped by the Lucky Treasure
Shop yet?<sp:0:4:0>It's drawn a lot of tourists to our little
coastal town, that place.

Always has <clr:0000>great prizes<clr:ffff>.


The owner acts a little aloof, but he's a
good guy at heart. Just wants people to
enjoy themselves.<sp:0:4:0>Actually, if you want to get on his
good side, just...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Wait. <sp:5:0:0>What am I doing? I don't have time
to dispense local wisdom.<sp:0:4:0>I need to rebuild my house so I can go
out and fish again.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The monsters are dealt with, sure,
but that doesn't mean I'll go fishing
at night. It's not safe and never was.
Now that my house is rebuilt, I'm going
to go and get some sleep.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>When I first saw you walking toward
Lurelin, honestly, I thought you'd be
skewered for sure.
One guy beating all those pirates? It's
unthinkable! Impossible! <sp:5:0:0>But somehow
you did it!
And because of that, I can now fish
without fear!
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Lucky Treasure Shop <clr:ffff>used to be
our village's biggest attraction.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>prizes<clr:ffff> were great. Out-of-towners
and locals alike would line up to try to
win them.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But we'll be hard-pressed to rebuild it
after the ransacking it got.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>See that smoke?<sp:0:4:0>I think that's where he is. He's probably
up there with Bolson figuring out what to
do next.
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Poor guy's been inconsolable... Having a
visitor might cheer him up.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Have you dropped by the Lucky Treasure
Shop yet?

It's drawn a lot of tourists to our little
coastal town, that place.

Always has <clr:0000>great prizes<clr:ffff>. The owner acts a
little aloof, but he's a good guy at heart. 

Actually, if you want to get on his
good side, just...<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Wait. I wasn't supposed to tell people that...<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400>Ignore me! <sp:5:1:0>What do I know anyway?
I'm just a fisherman...
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm. I'd like to play a round at the
Lucky Treasure Shop.<sp:0:4:0>But I already did it once today, so I'll
have to get one of <clr:0000>those<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Wait... <sp:5:0:0>I wasn't supposed to tell people that, was I?<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400>Ignore me! I catch fish for a living.
What do I know?
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But you picked a bad time to visit.
Monsters have taken the village.
Almost everyone is evacuated.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'd like to try my luck and crack open
a treasure chest.

But I already did it once today, and
I don't have any <clr:0000>roasted porgy<clr:ffff>...
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Seeing as you've come all this way,
I suppose you might as well talk to
the head of the village.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>When I first saw a figure head toward
Lurelin, honestly, I thought they'd be
skewered for sure.
One guy beating all those pirates? It's
unthinkable! Impossible! <sp:5:0:0>But somehow
you did it!
And because of that, I can now fish
without fear!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Have you tried your luck at the
Lucky Treasure Shop? The owner might
seem tough, but he's a good guy.
He says that since people travel so far
to reach our remote village, he wants
them to go home happy.
That's why he gives such <clr:0000>great prizes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Make sure you bring <clr:0000>roasted porgy<clr:ffff>.
Give him that and he'll let you play
the game again!
Talk_1002: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Are you trying to get to <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>Those monsters did a number on it.
Ugh... <sp:5:0:0>Look at the state it's in! Even the
<clr:0000>central pillar<clr:ffff> is broken.
What do I know about repairing houses?
I catch fish for a living!
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>I gotta thank you. Lurelin is looking as
good as I've ever seen it.<sp:0:4:0>You'd never know monsters tore the
place apart!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But as a humble fisherman, I'm afraid
the only rewards I can offer are of the
slippery, scaly variety...
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, wait! Have you been to the Lucky
Treasure Shop?<sp:0:4:0>The owner has a rule that after you play
once, you can't come back for a while.<sp:0:4:0>But he's got a soft spot for <clr:0000>roasted porgy<clr:ffff>.
If you give him some, he'll let you play the
game again!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>That's a secret, but as our town's savior,
I think you earned the right to hear it.
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I want to go out and catch a feast's worth
of tasty fish for you, our town's savior.
Right now though... <sp:5:0:0>I'm a defeated man.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Whatever fish I catch, I'll put here.
You're welcome to take as many as
you like.
